3 
hello@recruitery.co | 0886 006 304
o
ePTW is a mobile application to ensure that the job/task can be carried out safely. 
Having the permit alone does not eliminate all the hazards, safety can be achieved only 
by preparing for the work and those who carrying it out.  
o
ePTW help transparency, speed and efficiency in authorising permit to work where 
connectivity is constraint at work site. 
●

team member. Gather requirement from client/end user then break-down tasks and assign to 
team member
